scripts.postinstall: cd ui && npm i && cd ../api && npm i
scripts.test:run:mongo: sudo docker rm -fv mongo-dreams-test ; sudo docker run --name mongo-dreams-test --publish=28017:27017 mongo:4.4.3
scripts.test:run:app: concurrently --kill-others "npm run test:run --prefix api" "./scripts/wait.sh 4001 && npm run test:run --prefix ui"
scripts.test:run:servers: sudo pwd && concurrently "npm run test:run:mongo" "npm run test:run:app"
